dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 259 IH: To prevent the territories of the United States from losing current Medicaid funding.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Miss González-Colón of Puerto Rico introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To prevent the territories of the United States from losing current Medicaid funding.

section.text: Section 1202 of Public Law 111–152, 124 Stat. 1056, is amended by adding a new subsection (c) to read as follows:

subsection.text: For fiscal years 2018, 2019, and each subsequent year, the Secretary shall allocate to each territory an amount that is not less than the amount provided the territory in 2017 under subsections (a) and (b) of this section.
